events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under refund due to customer's request for money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like a refund for your order. I am here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund?
My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong product received instead of the correct one.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days. No need to return the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response and for making the refund process simple. I appreciate your help.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your account shortly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure that the refund was received properly. Please reach out if there are any issues.
As the refund was processed and confirmed received, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
